content: you can find the free pattern on my website https //littleloveeveryday com/amigurumi-ghost-pattern/ skill level easy/intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - half_double_crochet - double_crochet - bobble stitch - increase - invisible decrease - invisible fasten_off - slip_stitch working in front and back loops materials you will need medium worsted weight yarn in white purple yellow orange and brown 3 5 mm crochet hook 8 mm safety eyes polyester fiberfill for stuffing black embroidery thread and needle tapestry needle stitch marker scissors
